content:
You are either one or two steps away from success, the former expresses competence; the latter—completely mired down where only a forgiving lodestar can offer a chance to escape.Are You Satisfied?>Are You Satisfied? # By default, all are born to possess mundane lives. It matters zero how arable dreams are believed to be, how proper the nurture, how felicitous the fortune, and how determined the moment. If, as a product, one is indistinguishable from his environmental creators—with the exception that they do not lead mundane lives—then he is designed like the billions.
Definition of Stentorian>Definition of Stentorian # Used to describe a loud or booming voice.
summary: You are either one or two steps away from success, the former expresses competence; the latter—completely mired down where only a forgiving lodestar can offer a chance to escape.Are You Satisfied?
title: Stentorian Mind
